title: Bug 114905: Default value is lost in list box of report parameter after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. [steps to reproduce missing]
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. The OK button can still be used even after modifying the default value.
EB: Change the display type to Combo Box. The default value should be 'aaa'. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out.
